segments.text: It sure is hot . Why don't we go in the Haunted House ? At least it will be air conditioned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've told you a thousand times . I don't want to go in the Haunted House.It ' s too scary !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . Maybe I'll go alone then . I really don't want to miss it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go alone if you want . I will wait at that cafe and have a soda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It might take a long time . Because there is a line , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But if you don't go in the Haunted House , you won't be happy.So I will wait for you . It's no problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry it took so long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . But how was it ?
segments.speaker: S2
